mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that buttons and text are more prominent and optimized for smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and utilize lazy loading for content to improve speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions, header tags, and include more localized content for better SEO ranking.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the navigation menu and make information more accessible within fewer clicks.
tips: Consider improving site speed by reducing the number of large files and scripts that load on initial page load.
Enhance SEO by including location-specific keywords and improving internal linking.
Mobile navigation could be made more intuitive with a sticky menu or a clearer CTA button.
